Definition at line 656 of file RangeServer.cc.

void RangeServer::load_range ( ResponseCallback *  cb,
const TableIdentifier *  table,
const RangeSpec *  range,
const char *  transfer_log_dir,
const RangeState *  range_state 
)

Get TableInfo, create if doesn't exist

Make sure this range is not already loaded

Lazily create METADATA table pointer

Take ownership of the range by writing the 'Location' column in the METADATA table, or /hypertable/root{location} attribute of Hyperspace if it is the root range.

Take ownership of the range

Check for existence of and create, if necessary, range directory (md5 of endrow) under all locality group directories for this table

Create root and/or metadata log if necessary

NOTE: The range does not need to be locked in the following replay since it has not been added yet and therefore no one else can find it and concurrently access it.
